name: eRS-RejectReferral-Operation-1
description: Operation to reject a referral. Allows one to provide rejection details.

parameter.name: rejectionReason
parameter.documentation: The reason why the referral is being rejected.

parameter.name: rejectionComments
parameter.documentation: This may be mandatory, depending on the specific value chosen for rejectionReason. Max: 2000 chars.

parameter.name: appointmentCancelledinPAS
parameter.documentation: If true, the appointment has been cancelled in the PAS system.
